header.title: Which Superhero Are You?
header.subtitle: Discover your inner superhero through this personality test!

red.name: The Adventurous Innovator
red.description: You are curious, impulsive, and love new experiences. You get energized by new ideas and aren't afraid to venture into unknown territory.

yellow.name: The Social Optimist
yellow.description: You are warm, outgoing, and enthusiastic. You love being around others and easily spread positive energy.

green.name: The Calm Harmonizer
green.description: You seek balance, harmony, and good relationships. You are a good listener, cooperative, and caring.

blue.name: The Analytical Planner
blue.description: You are systematic, reliable, and thorough. You like clear plans and appreciate predictability.

1.text: How do you prefer to start a new week?

options.red: Jump right into new projects without a clear plan, ready for whatever comes up.
options.yellow: Get colleagues together for a joint kick-off, filling the room with laughter and enthusiasm.
options.green: Sit down with a good friend and calmly share ideas over a cup of tea.
options.blue: Make a detailed list of tasks and prioritize them in the right order.
